title: Designing a Language Education System Through Digital Media Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and understanding of fundamental digital tool usage
context.additional_context: Requires balanced integration of digital media and traditional learning methods in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain at least three affordances of digital media in individual/social contexts.
Learners can complete language learning activities (reading, writing, communication) using smartphone-based tools with over 80% success.
Learners can compare educational effectiveness in digital/analog environments and select context-appropriate methods.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
